code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const HealthMetricsDashboard=_ref=>{let{metrics,onEdit,onDelete,onView}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-4 sm:p-6 md:p-8",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-6 text-center",children:"Health Metrics Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid gap-4 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3",children:metrics.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-500 col-span-full text-center",children:"No health entries yet."}):metrics.map(metric=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white rounded-xl shadow-md p-4 hover:shadow-lg transition",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text-sm text-gray-600",children:["Date: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"font-medium",children:metric.date})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text-sm text-gray-600",children:["Temperature: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"font-medium",children:[metric.temperature," \xB0F"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text-sm text-gray-600",children:["Blood Pressure: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"font-medium",children:[metric.bloodPressure.systolic,"/",metric.bloodPressure.diastolic," mmHg"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text-sm text-gray-600",children:["Heart Rate: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"font-medium",children:[metric.heartRate," bpm"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex justify-between mt-4 text-sm",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onView(metric),className:"text-blue-600 hover:underline",children:"View"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onEdit(metric),className:"text-green-600 hover:underline",children:"Edit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onDelete(metric.id),className:"text-red-600 hover:underline",children:"Delete"})]})]},metric.id))})]});};export default HealthMetricsDashboard;
